lead_paragraph: Ligue 1 leaders Nice will be without striker Mario Balotelli for at least three games after the Italian picked up a calf injury during training this week, coach Lucien Favre said.

headline.print_headline: Nice's Balotelli Out For at Least Three Games With Calf Injury
headline.main: Nice's Balotelli Out For at Least Three Games With Calf Injury
